name: Mom's Tempting Apple Crisp
author: Ramona Glastetter
instructions: Preheat oven to 375Â°. Spray a 9 x 13 inch pan with nonstick cooking spray. Peel and slice apples and spread in prepared pan. In a medium bowl, combine flour, brown sugar, oats and margarine. Mix with fork until crumbly; spoon over apples. Bake for 35 minutes or until apples are tender and bubbly.
